20110103150112.000|20110103150115.000|TR0|Well, Arkansas wildlife officials are

20110103150135.000|20110103150137.000|TR0|Here is the theory so far.  A lightning 
20110103150137.000|20110103150140.000|TR0|strike, high altitude hail, or maybe even

20110103150142.000|20110103150145.000|TR0|fireworks. From dead birds to dead fish,

20110103150553.000|20110103150555.000|TR0|The U.S. Navy is investigating a series of 
20110103150555.000|20110103150558.000|TR0|raunchy video that were shown aboard the 
20110103150558.000|20110103150600.000|TR0|aircraft carrier, the "USS Enterprise."  
20110103150600.000|20110103150603.000|TR0|Videos complete with "F" bombs and 
20110103150603.000|20110103150605.000|TR0|anti-gay slurs.  They were being shown 
20110103150605.000|20110103150608.000|TR0|while the ship was supporting U.S. troops 
20110103150608.000|20110103150610.000|TR0|fighting and dying in combat.     But 
20110103150610.000|20110103150613.000|TR0|before you dismiss this as a case of boys

20110103150620.000|20110103150623.000|TR0|feature the man who now commands the ship.

20110103152158.000|20110103152200.000|TR0|because what this does is it makes it a

20110103152208.000|20110103152210.000|TR0|defraud or harm or threaten, and you can

20110103152215.000|20110103152218.000|TR0|connected in essence is what we're talking 
20110103152218.000|20110103152220.000|TR0|about here.
20110103152220.000|20110103152223.000|TR0|
20110103152223.000|20110103152225.000|TR0|PHILLIPS:  Now, how do you prove the harm?
20110103152225.000|20110103152228.000|TR0|
20110103152228.000|20110103152230.000|TR0|NIGAM:  So in a way you have to look at 
20110103152230.000|20110103152233.000|TR0|this just like you do in the physical 
20110103152233.000|20110103152235.000|TR0|world.  When you think of harm, think of 
20110103152235.000|20110103152238.000|TR0|it the way the dictionary would.  
20110103152238.000|20110103152241.000|TR0|Intimidating somebody, harming somebody, 
20110103152241.000|20110103152243.000|TR0|threatening somebody.  All those words are 
20110103152243.000|20110103152246.000|TR0|words used in laws today in the physical 
20110103152246.000|20110103152248.000|TR0|side.  What you're doing is  that 
20110103152248.000|20110103152251.000|TR0|combining that with the internet side.
20110103152251.000|20110103152253.000|TR0|
20110103152253.000|20110103152256.000|TR0|So it's actually not so difficult to

20110103154447.000|20110103154449.000|TR0|the coffee houses where they're usually 
20110103154449.000|20110103154452.000|TR0|doing it.  So, what exactly is in this 
20110103154452.000|20110103154454.000|TR0|law, and my guess is people aren't taking 
20110103154454.000|20110103154457.000|TR0|it so well, Al?
20110103154457.000|20110103154459.000|TR0|
20110103154459.000|20110103154502.000|TR0|AL GOODMAN, CNN MADRID BUREAU CHIEF:  
20110103154502.000|20110103154504.000|TR0|Well, the 30 percent of the Spaniards who 
20110103154504.000|20110103154507.000|TR0|smoke, Kyra, are definitely not taking it 
20110103154507.000|20110103154509.000|TR0|well.  They're fuming, as you say.
20110103154509.000|20110103154512.000|TR0|
20110103154512.000|20110103154515.000|TR0|This is an incredible law, if you think of 
20110103154515.000|20110103154517.000|TR0|it, for a country that's had a 500-year 
20110103154517.000|20110103154520.000|TR0|relationship with tobacco.  Remember, it 
20110103154520.000|20110103154522.000|TR0|was Christopher Columbus who sailed from 
20110103154522.000|20110103154525.000|TR0|Spain who sought tobacco on his voyages to 
20110103154525.000|20110103154527.000|TR0|the new world. Spanish sailors brought it 
20110103154527.000|20110103154530.000|TR0|to Europe.  And now, you've got this ban 
20110103154530.000|20110103154532.000|TR0|inside bars, restaurants, discotheques, 
20110103154532.000|20110103154535.000|TR0|all these enclosed public places.
20110103154535.000|20110103154537.000|TR0|
20110103154537.000|20110103154540.000|TR0|It's up to the management of the bars and 
20110103154540.000|20110103154542.000|TR0|restaurants basically to be the immediate 
20110103154542.000|20110103154545.000|TR0|enforcers, but anybody can make a 
20110103154545.000|20110103154547.000|TR0|complaint, and there are some very stiff 
20110103154547.000|20110103154550.000|TR0|fines.  Forty dollars if you get caught 
20110103154550.000|20110103154552.000|TR0|once smoking, and $800 to $130,000 if you 
20110103154552.000|20110103154555.000|TR0|get caught repeatedly violating this new 
20110103154555.000|20110103154557.000|TR0|law.  So, they put a big stick in as well. 
20110103154557.000|20110103154600.000|TR0| Kyra?
20110103154600.000|20110103154603.000|TR0|
20110103154603.000|20110103154605.000|TR0|PHILLIPS:  Wow.  How does the law compare 
20110103154605.000|20110103154608.000|TR0|to other countries in Europe and even in 
20110103154608.000|20110103154610.000|TR0|the U.S.?
20110103154610.000|20110103154613.000|TR0|
20110103154613.000|20110103154615.000|TR0|GOODMAN:  Well, Spain four years ago had a 
20110103154615.000|20110103154618.000|TR0|law that banned smoking in the workplace.  
20110103154618.000|20110103154620.000|TR0|But at the time it let restaurants and 
20110103154620.000|20110103154623.000|TR0|bars choose.  Now that's done.  Now it's 
20110103154623.000|20110103154625.000|TR0|banned all across.  So, this now has Spain 
20110103154625.000|20110103154628.000|TR0|with the strictest of the western European 
20110103154628.000|20110103154630.000|TR0|questions. Britain, France, and Italy 
20110103154630.000|20110103154633.000|TR0|banning it in the enclosed public places.
20110103154633.000|20110103154635.000|TR0|
20110103154635.000|20110103154638.000|TR0|According to a group called NoSmoke.org in 
20110103154638.000|20110103154640.000|TR0|the United States, 23 U.S. states have 
20110103154640.000|20110103154643.000|TR0|similar legislation, not in the workplace, 
20110103154643.000|20110103154645.000|TR0|in bars and restaurants.  That includes 
20110103154645.000|20110103154648.000|TR0|New York, Illinois, Michigan, Washington

20110103155629.000|20110103155632.000|TR0|damage to that habitat.

20110103155634.000|20110103155637.000|TR0|ZARRELLA:  The disagreement is clear cut.  
20110103155637.000|20110103155639.000|TR0|The Bureau of Land Management, BLM, is 
20110103155639.000|20110103155642.000|TR0|charged with caring for and managing 
20110103155642.000|20110103155644.000|TR0|nearly 40,000 horses and burros roaming on 
20110103155644.000|20110103155647.000|TR0|26 million acres of the West.  While this 
20110103155647.000|20110103155649.000|TR0|federal land, your land, was set aside for 
20110103155649.000|20110103155652.000|TR0|the horses, they don't have free rein.  
20110103155652.000|20110103155654.000|TR0|The land is considered multi-use.

20110103155657.000|20110103155659.000|TR0|SHEPARD:  Wildlife, life stock,

20110103155750.000|20110103155752.000|TR0|helicopter chases one single burro,
